title: Lynda - Office 365: Access Essential Training with Adam Wilbert
description:
Lynda - Office 365: Access Essential Training with Adam Wilbert 

Subjects:  Business, Education + Elearning, 
Software:  Access, Office 365, 

5h 4m Beginner Feb 09, 2015 | Uploaded in Feb 19, 2015 by 2boweb


Join author and database expert Adam Wilbert on a tour of the essential features of Microsoft Access 2013, the database application included with every Office 365 subscription, and discover how to store, organize, and access your data more efficiently. First, Adam explains the concepts behind relational databases, before moving on to building tablesÃ¢â‚¬â€the foundation of any database. He then shows how to define the relationships between tables and use queries to find and filter data. The course also shows how to apply rules and validation to minimize data-entry errors; use forms to build a database interface complete with interactive buttons and combo boxes; create reports for printing and sharing; 
and automate these tasks, and many others, with macros.

Topics include:

	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Setting primary and foreign keys
	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Establishing relationships and maintaining referential integrity
	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Sorting and filtering data
	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Building queries with constraints and criteria
	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Editing table data with queries
	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Generating forms from tables
	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Adding form controls
	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Creating reports with totals and labels
	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Embedding macros in buttons
	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Repairing your database
	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Protecting databases with passwords
